pages.title: Security
pages.description: The details of your contract are encrypted and can only be viewed by those involved in the deal.

pages.title: Guarantees
pages.description: You are sure of your partner's solvency and are protected against unilateral termination of the deal.

pages.title: Checker
pages.description: You can specify a third party who checks the result of the partner's work and decides whether funds should be paid to the partner

pages.title: Zero fee
pages.description: You can make deals without service fee, after activation of **Holder mode**.
